Question: Ettifos CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ettifos

Product: CES 2024 Showcase

- Newly redesigned 5G-V2X Sidelink Platform (SIRIUS)
- V2X Aftermarket Safety Device for fleets (V2X-AIR)
- Demonstrations available at LVCC North Hall 10653
- Focus on connected vehicles, smart city, smart infrastructure, and fleetsafety
- Emphasis on 5G-V2X technology for safer, smarter, and greener roads
- Opportunities for in-person appointments to learn about specific business needs
- Active participation in 5GAA and TRBAM events
- Founding member of the Connected Smart Mobility (COSMO) industry consortium
- Focus on V2X technology for traffic efficiency, road safety, and connectivity
- Emphasis on the benefits of 5G New Radio (NR) for wireless communication
- Job opportunities available for individuals passionate about connected mobility
- Contact information: pr@ettifos.com
Summary_cn:
Ettifos

產品：CES 2024 展示

- 新設計的5G-V2X Sidelink 平台 (SIRIUS)
- 用於車隊的 V2X 汽車零售安全設備 (V2X-AIR)
- 可在 LVCC 北展館 10653 展示
- 關注連接汽車、智慧城市、智慧基礎設施和車隊安全
- 強調 5G-V2X 技術對於更安全、更智能、更環保的道路的影響
- 可安排親自面談以了解具體業務需求的機會
- 積極參與 5GAA 和 TRBAM 活動
- 連接智慧移動 (COSMO) 行業聯盟的創始會員
- 關注 V2X 技術對於交通效率、道路安全和連接性的影響
- 強調 5G 新無線電(NR) 在無線通信方面的優勢
- 提供給對連接式移動有熱情的人士的就業機會
- 聯繫資訊： pr@ettifos.com
